text: Villa La Belle Époque. Villa La Belle Époque is a historic mansion in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France. It was built from 1909 to 1911 for Mr Enos. It was designed by architect Jean-Baptiste Blanchi, with additional gilded decorations designed by Michel de Tarnowski. It has been listed as an official national monument since October 23, 1992. ==References== Category:Houses completed in 1911 Category:Monuments historiques of Nice
title: Villa La Belle Époque
